description.value:
Allows surviving in a vacuum, has a Rebreather, tether lines, clamps, etc. At least 1 hour of air. Whenever taking Rending or Explosive Damage, 40% chance that suit is breached. Breached suits do not count as sealed (Can be repaired with tape, patches, etc, as a Full Action)

Requirements

Poor suits may not have adequate protection, leading to long term sickness

Effect: Plentiful

Notes: 100 T
